title: WWE LFG (New Episode)
overview: WWE LFG (Legends & Future Greats) will offer viewers an inside look at the rigorous training process, featuring iconic WWE Legends such as Paul "Triple H" Levesque and Shawn Michaels and weekly regular coaches Undertaker, Booker T, Mickie James and Bubba Ray Dudley as they mentor a new generation in weekly matches on their quest to become the next WWE Superstars.
